Introduction
This topic contains information on searching for lost paper claims folders, including
general search procedure
rebuilding lost
paper claims folders
, and
notice of death (NOD) or Dependents’ Educational Assistance (DEA) folders
, and
combining folders when the original folder is located
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Lost Paper Claims Folders and Reconciliation of Duplicate Records
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
